content.raw:
we've seen a couple of gazebo 1.8.6 crashes on start up, backtrace below 



```
#!c++

Core was generated by `gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so vrc_final_task10.world -r --record_enco'.
Program terminated with signal 11, Segmentation fault.
#0  0x00007f41ab467540 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::OnPoseMsg(boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::msgs::PosesStamped const> const&) ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f41ab467540 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::OnPoseMsg(boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::msgs::PosesStamped const> const&) ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
#1  0x00007f41ab482559 in gazebo::transport::CallbackHelperT<gazebo::msgs::PosesStamped>::HandleMessage(boost::shared_ptr<google::protobuf::Message>) ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
#2  0x00007f41afac3d26 in gazebo::transport::Node::ProcessIncoming() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#3  0x00007f41aface38e in gazebo::transport::TopicManager::ProcessNodes(bool)
    () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#4  0x00007f41afab8178 in gazebo::transport::ConnectionManager::RunUpdate() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#5  0x00007f41afab8efd in gazebo::transport::ConnectionManager::Run() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#6  0x00007f41ae3e0ce9 in thread_proxy ()
   from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#7  0x00007f41aef48e9a in start_thread ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
#8  0x00007f41ad789ccd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
#9  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
```
